REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0274 reute r f BC-ASHTON-TATE-<TATE>-TO 03-03 0067

TEXT.TITLE: ASHTON-TATE <TATE> TO OFFER COMMON SHARES
TEXT.BODY: Ashton-Tate said it intends to file for an offering of about two mln shares within the next 30 days. It said proceeds would be used for working capital and other general corporate purposes, including the possible acquisition of other businesses or additional technology. Ashton-Tate now has about 23.6 mln shares outstanding. Reuter
